channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: No, America Is Not Adopting a ‘Spheres-of-Influence’ Doctrine
item.description: There’s no evidence Donald Trump is interested in focusing solely on the Western Hemisphere while ceding the rest of the world to China and Russia.

item.title: How to Make Fusion Great Again and Beat China
item.description: The U.S. can achieve preeminence in fusion power — if we’re willing to lean into incentives and free enterprise to encourage innovation.

item.title: Judge blocks Trump's elections order in lawsuit by vote-by-mail states Oregon and Washington
item.description: A federal judge on Friday blocked President Trump's administration from enforcing most of his executive order on elections against the vote-by-mail st...

item.title: 250 years after 'Common Sense,' Revolutionary War writer Thomas Paine may finally get D.C. memorial
item.description: Some 250 years after "Common Sense" helped inspire the 13 colonies to declare independence, Thomas Paine might receive a long-anticipated tribute from...

item.title: The End of a Spiritual Retreat in the Aspen Mountains
item.description: St. Benedict’s Monastery was one of the last vestiges of Western spiritual tradition in an increasingly secular area.

item.title: Triumphs and Tin Ears at Princeton’s New Art Museum
item.description: A look at the permanent collection in its brand-new galleries.

item.title: Judge says Trump administration can't block child care, other program money for 5 states for now
item.description: A federal judge ruled Friday that President Donald Trump's administration cannot block federal money for child care subsidies and other programs aimed...

item.title: Trump’s Greenland Grab Ignores One Crucial Detail: He Doesn’t Have the Authority
item.description: Whether by purchase or conquest, adding territory to the United States requires congressional approval.

item.title: Trump promises oil executives 'total safety' if they invest in Venezuela after Maduro ouster
item.description: President Donald Trump on Friday called on oil executives to rush back into Venezuela as the White House tries to quickly secure $100 billion in inves...

item.title: When Can We Start Uprooting Domestic Terror Cells Attacking Law Enforcement?
item.description: It’s been a year since Trump took back the White House -- how is it possible we know so little about these cells, and when will we see mass arrests of...

item.title: Democrats Want Anti-ICE Protesters To Die So They Can Protect Their Fraudulent Patronage With Riots
item.description: Democrats created the conditions that led to the fatal shooting in Minneapolis, and they are now capitalizing on the chaos.

item.title: DHS: Portland Suspects Who ‘Weaponized’ Vehicle Against CBP Agent Are Venezuelan Gang Affiliates

item.title: Colombian President Gustavo Petro is coming to the U.S. next month to meet Trump
item.description: President Trump will meet with Colombian President Gustavo Petro at the White House next month.

item.title: We Need A J6-Level Manhunt For Everyone Who Obstructs Immigration Law Enforcement

item.title: Here’s How Professional Activists Use Guerrilla Tactics To Sabotage ICE Arrests
item.description: Renee Good, fatally shot by an ICE agent this week in Minneapolis, was a 'warrior' for the anti-ICE group, the New York Post reports.
